Articles.Content: Will KSP 2 be on xbox one? I have an xbox one and have been looking forward to playing this game with some extended family that also enjoy the game, but it seems like it will only be on the series consoles? Is that the case?

27 minutes ago, Tlee007 said:

Will KSP 2 be on xbox one? I have an xbox one and have been looking forward to playing this game with some extended family that also enjoy the game, but it seems like it will only be on the series consoles? Is that the case?

No. KSP 2 will not be on Xbox One. 

It will only be on PC for EA. After EA it will come to Xbox Series X and PS5.
